DOC.brief_summary: To assess if the sublingual tablet will have similar pharmacokinetics as the conventional tablet of alprazolam.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Of Alprazolam Sublingual Tablet Versus Conventional Tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2. Signed informed consent. Evidence or history of clinically significant abnormalities Positive drug screen, excessive alcohol and tobacco use
